list.text: Ghost - Superior performance out of the box

box.code:
# Install Ghost CLI globally
npm install ghost-cli@latest -g

# Create and navigate to directory
mkdir my-ghost-site
cd my-ghost-site

# Install Ghost locally
ghost install local

# Start Ghost
ghost start

# Access your site at http://localhost:2368
# Admin panel at http://localhost:2368/ghost

# docker-compose.yml
version: '3.3'
services:
  ghost:
    image: ghost:5-alpine
    restart: always
    ports:
      - "2368:2368"
    environment:
      url: http://localhost:2368
      database__client: mysql
      database__connection__host: mysql
      database__connection__user: root
      database__connection__password: password
      database__connection__database: ghost
    depends_on:
      - mysql

  mysql:
    image: mysql:8.0
    restart: always
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: password
      MYSQL_DATABASE: ghost

# Run with: docker-compose up -d

list.text: Fast Loading - Optimized out of the box
Use Ghost CLI - Official command line tool

box.code:
# Installation & Setup
ghost install local          # Local development
ghost install production     # Production setup

# Management
ghost start                  # Start Ghost
ghost stop                   # Stop Ghost
ghost restart                # Restart Ghost
ghost update                 # Update Ghost
ghost update --force         # Force update

# Content Operations
ghost backup                 # Backup content
ghost restore <file>         # Restore from backup
ghost doctor                 # System health check

# Development
ghost ls                     # List running instances
ghost log                    # View logs
ghost run                    # Run directly (dev)

# Configuration
ghost setup <command>        # Setup various components
ghost config                 # View configuration

# In Ghost Admin â†’ Integrations â†’ Add custom integration

# Content API Key - Read only access
Key: 1234567890abcdef1234567890
URL: https://yoursite.com/ghost/api/content/posts/?key=API_KEY

# Admin API Key - Full access
Key: a1b2c3d4e5f67890abcdef123456
URL: https://yoursite.com/ghost/api/admin/posts/

# Using with cURL
curl -H "Authorization: Ghost [API_KEY]" \
     https://yoursite.com/ghost/api/admin/posts/

# Using with fetch
fetch('https://yoursite.com/ghost/api/content/posts/?key=API_KEY')
